attributes.action: Adopt a Shoot To Kill Policy when dealing with Probable Suicide Terrorists
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The recent attacks by suicidal terrorists in Glasgow Airport shame our security services.
What a farce an Off duty policeman put out the blaze on a suicide bomber, they then proceed to admit the terrorists into Hospital.
Woe and behold they Evacuate the Hospital, a bomb?
How many men, women & children could have been Killed.
This must stop " Shoot to Kill " then deal with the situation of a Bomb.
Islamic Terrorists must be confronted by armed Security Services, we will not get away with an attack again.
